channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- YaMaps for WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- YaMaps for WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-0270|2024-08-02T05:02:44.187Z -- unknown -- yamaps%20for%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The YaMaps for WordPress Plugin WordPress plugin before 0.6.26 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
